Package org.jdesktop.jdic.screensaver

Class Summary
ScreensaverBase Base class for screensavers written in Java.
ScreensaverContext Context object with information about the screensaver.
ScreensaverSettings Holds the currently active settings for a screensaver.
SimpleScreensaver Base class for simple screensavers who will have their paint() method invoked on a regular basis to render each frame.
